author: markt
msg: - Fix bug 13499 (again). If page output is unbuffered, illegal state exception is no longer
thrown on forward if and only if nothing has been written to the page. The ise will still be
thrown on forward if there has been any unbuffered output (JSP.5.5)

author: markt
msg: Revert previous patch as this breaks more than it fixes. Need to find an alternative fix for bug 13499.
